text: Joshua O'Connor (born 20 May 1990) is a British actor. He is well known for his role as Charles, Prince of Wales, in the Netflix drama series The Crown (2019â€“2020). In 2021, O'Connor won a Primetime Emmy Award and a Golden Globe Award for this role.
